data.product_description:
An advanced, easy to use 
marketing automation platform

initial_reviews.review_title: The best brazilian Marketing Automation tool for now
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Pipz?
As I work hard with Inbound Marketing, I have used several tools in the last 3 years. Pipz is undoubtedly one of the best tools I've ever used. Certainly the best tool made in Brazil. The tool is easy to use and has a very beautiful design. Building flows is very intuitive as well.

What do you dislike about Pipz?
For now, I have no objections to this tool.

What problems is Pipz solving and how is that benefiting you?
In the company where I work, we used another Inbound Marketing tool that had a good performance. The main reasons that made us migrate to Pipz were: 1. The easiness of the tool in the construction of the production flows. 2 The quality of landing pages.

With Pipz the task of nurturing and capturing our leads got easier.
